head.citation-title: Miyachi’s Theorem for the Quaternion Fourier Transform
head.abstracts: © 2019, Springer Science+Business Media, LLC, part of Springer Nature.The quaternion Fourier transform (QFT) satisfies some uncertainty principles similar to the Euclidean Fourier transform. In this paper, we establish Miyachi’s theorem for this transform and consequently generalize and prove the analogue of Hardy’s theorem and Cowling–Price uncertainty principle in the QFT domain.
